resources.description:
Returns the newest tokens minted on the blockchain based on mint timestamp,
filtered by an activity window and optional category.

accepts.description:
Returns the newest tokens minted on the blockchain based on mint timestamp,
filtered by an activity window and optional category.

activity_window.description: The length of time over which activity is measured.

category.description: Filter by token category. Currently, only 'virtuals' on Base is supported.

estimate_cost.description: When true, returns only the SLAM token cost of this query

num.description: The maximum number of tokens to return. Max: 1000.

block.description: The block number at which this data snapshot was generated

chain.description: The name of the blockchain network (e.g., 'base')

slam.description: The SLAM token cost for this API call

tokens.description: List of trending tokens for the specified activity window and category

fdv.description: The tokens fully diluted valuation in USD

block.description: The block number of the first mint

hash.description: The transaction hash of the first mint

utc.description: The UTC timestamp of the mint (ISO 8601 format)

liquidity.description: The liquidity value for the token in USD

name.description: The full name of the token

rank.description: The tokens newness rank, determined by timestamp of its first mint

cur.description: The current token price in USD

utc.description: The UTC timestamp of the block used for the response (ISO 8601 format)

resources.description:
Returns trending tokens across the entire blockchain for a specified activity window and optional category.
The size of the increase in active wallets over the activity window determines the token's trending rank.

accepts.description:
Returns trending tokens across the entire blockchain for a specified activity window and optional category.
The size of the increase in active wallets over the activity window determines the token's trending rank.

activity_window.description: The length of time over which activity is measured.

category.description: Filters to a specific subset of tokens. Currently only 'virtuals' is supported on Base.

estimate_cost.description: When true, returns only the SLAM token cost estimation.

num.description: The maximum number of tokens to return. Maximum: 250.

block.description: The block number at which this data snapshot was generated

chain.description: The name of the blockchain network (e.g., 'base')

slam.description: The SLAM token cost for this API call

tokens.description: List of trending tokens for the specified activity window and category

fdv.description: The tokens fully diluted valuation in USD

block.description: The block number of the first mint

hash.description: The transaction hash of the first mint

utc.description: The UTC timestamp of the mint (ISO 8601 format)

liquidity.description: The liquidity value for the token in USD

name.description: The full name of the token

rank.description: The tokens trending rank, determined by change in active wallets.

cur.description: The current token price in USD

utc.description: The UTC timestamp of the block used for the response (ISO 8601 format)

url.description: CDN URL of the generated image

resources.name: CDP Facilitator
resources.description: Best-in-class x402 facilitator. Fee-free USDC settlement on Base Mainnet. KYT/OFAC checks on every transaction.

resources.name: Corbits
resources.description: A production grade facilitator which supports multi-network, multi-token, multi-payment schemes.

resources.name: Mogami facilitator
resources.description: A free, developer-focused, production-ready facilitator for x402 payments. Use it instantly online, or launch your own Docker image in seconds.

resources.name: OpenX402.ai Facilitator
resources.description: The first permissionless, gasless and omnichain x402 facilitator that any x402 server can use without login

resources.name: PayAI Facilitator
resources.description: Accept x402 payments on all networks including Avalanche, Base, Polygon, Sei, Solana, and more! Get started in less than 1 minute. Supports all tokens. No API Keys required.

resources.name: Treasure Facilitator
resources.description: Treasure x402 Facilitator available on Base and Base Sepolia. Supports EIP-3009 compliant tokens including USDC, MAGIC, SMOL, MIO, AI Frens tokens, and more.

resources.name: WorldFun Facilitator
resources.description: AWE World.funs x402 Facilitator enables fee-free EIP-3009 payments in USDC and other ERC-20 tokens, handling verification and settlement on Base so developers dont need blockchain infrastructure.

resources.name: x402.org Facilitator
resources.description: Default testnet facilitator for x402

resources.name: x402.rs Facilitator
resources.description: Independent, open-source facilitator in Rust. Easy to self-host, extend to new networks, or use via our hosted instance.
